pages.text: Diplocaulus is an amphibian from the Carboniferous-Permian which sported a distinct boomerang shaped head. It reached up to 1.5m long and was likely mostly aquatic. Its tail would have been its main force of locomotion.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Amphibian Spawn$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Egg Collection Phial
